title: @Meddler Your thoughts on the state of Nidalee
body: I saw today that Nidalee has a 47.33% winrate in Diamond and a 41.21% winrate overall after her CD nerfs to her cougar Q,W and E and the heal nerf. I was wanting to know what Riot thinks of Nidalee at this point is she still too strong or is just fine now.  Before anyone says it I'm not asking for Nidalee to be buffed I'm just wanted to see what Riot thinks of her current state

replies.body: Theory is she's weak and it will probably be appropriate to buff her soon. Removal of Strength of Ages hit her particularly hard. We've been holding off on buffs until now though because of a large discrepancy between experienced Nidalee players and newer players. Nid's one of the champs who benefits the most from less intuitive optimizations in the jungle, so we've wanted to give it more time than most to see where she ends up once the new jungle's been properly adapted to.

Have you guys ever discussed just kicking her out of the jungle and buffing her so she can be played top or mid? It doesnt seem like there is a way to balance her for normal players without her being the most dominating champion in the hands of a pro
Thematically she belongs in the jungle. She's a damn cougar.
in my experience cougars belong in my bedroom ^^
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjYBOoCZSu8

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8VgiVOUr,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-29T21:03:43.605+0000)
>
> Theory is she's weak and it will probably be appropriate to buff her soon. Removal of Strength of Ages hit her particularly hard. We've been holding off on buffs until now though because of a large discrepancy between experienced Nidalee players and newer players. Nid's one of the champs who benefits the most from less intuitive optimizations in the jungle, so we've wanted to give it more time than most to see where she ends up once the new jungle's been properly adapted to.

As a long time nidalee player I honestly think she's decent at the moment. I just feel the meta has shifted so drastically with the jungle changes that the problems with her from last season are kind of irrelevant now. She used to excel at the early game but now I feel the window of opportunity in the early game has narrowed so it puts her into a snowball or feed situation. I think most champs clear the jungle fairly quickly which as before she was one of the few who could power clear like no other. Now i feel the meta has shifted away from such a farm fest and turned more into a "play smart and duel at the right time" mainly because camps don't respawn as fast so it's difficult to press your farming lead. Also I think that she's lacking mobility and I'm sure you're well aware of her squishiness. 

I'd propose reverting the summer nerfs that took away her auto resets and fast W cool down. That way she'd be better at dueling but now she's not going to be overly tanky in the early game which would require the experienced nidalee players to do what they do best, out play their opponent. Now i feel it's few and far between where I have that moment where I've got 100 health and come out on top in an early game duel.

Now i feel it's few and far between where I have that moment where I've got 100 health and come out on top in an early game duel.

you're not helping... 
yes that would let her able to jungle again. but it would just re-add the same issues that got those things removed.

it took riot 7 patches to get her into a perfectly balanced and untouched state after her 4.10 rework into the 4.17 perfect state for THREE roles balanced in EVERY elo  for THREE roles, all viable, none OP, no worthless, in ANY elo

then we go to patch 5.2 

since patch 5.2  until present day.. she has NEVER been balanced in the jungle for ANY patch, she has been viable in many of the patches, and even balanced for specific elos in others, but never ONCE was she balanced in EVERY elo.
that is a count of 45 patches... 46 once 6.24 goes live...

if you STILL have made ZERO progress in fixing her in 46 patches... i think its time to admit you CAN'T DO IT. STOP TRYING!!!

How about finally accepting that jungle nida with her current kit was a bad idea(both mid and toplane Nda died for good because of it even though they finally were in a good spot befor her passive was allowed to work vs monsters) and is about as easy to balance as kallista, ryze and azir?

Just remove passive on monsters and buff her, done. She's supposed to be a jungler and Riot wants to balance her that way.

It's like saying Aatrox should be buffed because support Aatrox.
No it's not. You're very very far from the point. -.-

Tbh I was expecting you to just say "Nidalee is so hot" and move on.


But this works.
It would be great if you could make her be less dogshit at laning.

ok i am going to repost this

> [{quoted}](name=SwiftKitten88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gsfgqyig,comment-id=0005000700000003,timestamp=2016-11-29T00:56:13.416+0000)
>
> since nidalee has now finally entered the realm of the top ten lowest winrates in the history of league, beating out 38% {{champion:236}} for that #10 spot. is it safe to assume she will be looked at? *cough 4.17 revert*
> 
> i mean as a nidalee main... and as the person who MADE the thread/s who requested for her to be a jungler because of her lore. (yes if you didn't know this, it actually IS my fault; so for once you CAN blame me, I'm sorry, I really am....)
> i think its safe to say... plz.. for the love of god.. take her out of the jungle...
> i mean yes she is fantastic at it... but that's because her entire hit is based around  high risk high reward. and being punished for making mistakes and missing spears... well the jungle mobs (with the exception of scuttle crab).. don't have a habit for dodging spears and she is so mobile you cant really invade her. and when she ganks.. unless the person she is ganking is an idoit they should be able to block the chase path if she misses the spear.
> 
> as a nidalee main i can say this:
> ALL if nidalee's weakness are based around getting IN HER FACE, around not getting hit by the spears and punishing her for missing. by keeping her from farming by poking her and forcing her to use mana on her heal.
> 
> she has NONE of these weaknesses in the jungle.. so you just tacked on nerf after nerf until she becomes worthless like she is now..
> 
> bring her laning back, do a direct revert to 4.17, with maybe some minor tweaks to make up for item changes. you did an AMAZING rework in 4.10. 
> it took a few patches to her her reworked to the perfect state which it stay from 4.17 to 5.1. 
> 
> and like i monkey's paw, i wished she could jungle.. and i got my wish. 
> i lost my mid lane nid, i lost my top nid, and i lost my support nid... and for i think THREE patches (5.2, 5.3, 5.4), i got a nidalee that was viable in FOUR lanes.
> 
> then the nerfs came.. and we lost support in 5.5, and mid as top became MUCH harder, by patch 5.15 nidalee could ONLY jungle with her other lanes unplayable. and no in patch 6.22 nid lost jungle. leaving her ZERO viable roles.
> 
> 
> so please. its been TWO YEARS, can i get my  4.17 laning nidalee back

STOP TRYING to balance her in the jungle, its been TWO YEARS.. GIVE IT UP, as i explained in my quoted, her kit is NOT designed have the freedom of the jungle. EVERY weakness she has is based around people getting in her face and preventing her from snowballing. you CAN'T do this if she is free to roam the jungle.

Hey again Meddler

If you don't mind, what are your thoughts on the following champions right now:

Darius, Jax, Nasus

Imo the discrepancy between Jax lane and jungle is really high right now, which I find sad because I don't want Jax to become another boring pve champ like Shyvana did when she couldn't lane anymore

A lot of people are complaining about Darius and Nasus both but I wanted your thoughts on them
She needs a rework.  I think the last rework, while killing her spears, gave her bigger issues.  Right now all she can do is jungle and if she does, she has to win early because she's useless late.

actually no it didn't.. her last rework was amazing. 4.17 to 5.1 nid was perfectly balanced in 3 lanes,  its was riot putting her in the jungle in patch 5.2 and then UNDOING her entire rework. that screwed her up.

im am tired of people thinking nidalee rework has ANYTHING to do with her jungle..  it didn't. that was completely separate, her REWORK was AMAZING
Maybe.  All I know is first riot broke her spears and then they broke her ability to lane.

Aren't Nida players suppose to use Thunderlord?

Yo what the hell. Why glass cannons are built as Tanks?
90% (estimating) of junglers took SotA simply it gave them some extra health which was useful as well as gave them a bit more sustain.

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8VgiVOUr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-11-30T00:49:41.712+0000)

yeah over 90% if nidalee took strength of ages.. and the 10% who didnt take SOA and took thunderlords instead had a 6% lower winrate than those took SOA. then they hit nidalee with a zillion nerfs.

 since in introduction of strength of the ages , nidalee balanced around HAVING that 300 extra hp. When you suddenly take that away.  you basically just nerfed her hp by 300. and seeing  wont even reach 1900 hp without HP items.. and the only hp item she GETS is {{item:3116}} 
you are now going to (after 6.24 goes live) 2.2k hp... as opposed to a 6.21 hp of 2.6k hp.

which late game may not be much

but {{item:3116}}  is normally the 3rd or 4th item nid completes, at which time she also should have a fully stacked strength of the ages.


aka long story short when you do nerf after nerf to a champ based on them having "strength X" and you take "X" away you cant possible expect them to NOT get worse...
I personally get the impression that Riot wants to push Nidalee back into lane.
And how so? **Every single nerf that was done in the past two years has made sure she stays dead for sure in lanes, her laneing always has been hit harder than her jungle!!!**
a 41% winrate is pretty good, the only time something is busted is when it gets over 50% win rate over all so right now she should be good
